programme.title: Oliver North’s role in Iran-Contra, 1987
programme.short_synopsis: Colonel Oliver North gives evidence about his involvement in the Iran-Contra scandal.
programme.medium_synopsis: Colonel Oliver North gives evidence before the congressional select committee about his role in the sale of arms to Iran, the profits of which funded the Contras in Nicaragua.
programme.long_synopsis: Colonel Oliver North gives evidence before the congressional select committee about his role in the sale of arms to Iran, the profits of which funded the Contras in Nicaragua.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
